welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.content:
An example using the default settings provided by the library!

@ayanobot/rankcard

npm i @ayanobot/rankcard

Ayano's own Rank Card generator! (: View the documentation [here](https://ayano.newtt.me/#/docs/rankcard/main/general/welcome) The default font is currently Neutra Text Bold - [Discord.js](https://discord.js.org) design font. ### To-do - [ ] Eris Support - [ ] More helper methods - [ ] More customisation

classes.name: RankCard
classes.description: A rank card, as used by Ayano!

params.name: input
params.description: The data for the rank card to initialise with

props.name: _data
props.description: Rank card data

methods.name: _calculateProgress
methods.description: Calculates the progress the progress bar should be at

methods.name: setBackground
methods.description: Sets the background of the rank card!

methods.name: setOverlay
methods.description: Sets the overlay of the rank card!

params.name: colour
params.description: The colour to make the overlay

params.name: level
params.description: The level to make the overlay

params.name: display
params.description: Whether the overlay should be displayed anymore

methods.name: setProgressBar
methods.description: Updates data about the progress bar's style!

params.name: rounded
params.description: Whether the progress bar should be rounded or not

methods.name: setProgressBarTrack
methods.description: Update the progress bar's track colour!

params.name: colour
params.description: The colour to make the progress bar track!

params.name: fonts
params.description: The fonts to build the card with

typedefs.name: BackgroundType
typedefs.description: Supported background types. This can be:* 'image'* 'colour'

typedefs.name: ProgressType
typedefs.description: Supported background types. This can be:* 'gradient'* 'colour'

typedefs.name: PartialPiece
typedefs.description: Internal type to represent part of a full piece of data.

props.name: data
props.description: The piece of data

props.name: colour
props.description: The colour to render the data with

props.name: size
props.description: The font size in pixels to render the data at

typedefs.name: Piece
typedefs.description: Internal type to represent a piece of data.

props.name: display
props.description: Whether the data should be displayed or not

props.name: displayText
props.description: What to describe the data as on display

typedefs.name: CardData
typedefs.description: Internal data used by the builder to render cards.

props.name: width
props.description: The width of the card

props.name: height
props.description: The height of the card

props.name: background.type
props.description: The type that the background should be. This can either be 'image' or 'colour'

props.name: background.value
props.description: The value of the background. Either a hexadecimal colour, or a Buffer.

props.name: progressBar.rounded
props.description: Whether the progress bar should be rounded or not

props.name: progressBar.x
props.description: The x coordinate at which the bar should be rendered

props.name: progressBar.y
props.description: The y coordinate at which the bar should be rendered

props.name: progressBar.height
props.description: The height of the progress bar

props.name: progressBar.width
props.description: The width of the progress bar

props.name: progressBar.trackColour
props.description: The colour which the track of the progres sbar should render as

props.name: progressBar.barColour.type
props.description: The type of the progress bar colour. This can either be 'gradient' or 'colour'.

props.name: progressBar.barColour.value
props.description: The value of the progress bar colour. Either a singular hexadecimal colour or a list of hexadecimal colours to make a gradient from.

props.name: avatar.source
props.description: The source of the avatar - either a URL or a Buffer.

props.name: avatar.x
props.description: The x coordinate at which the avatar should be rendered

props.name: avatar.y
props.description: The y coordinate at which the avatar should be rendered

props.name: avatar.height
props.description: The height of the progress avatar

props.name: avatar.width
props.description: The width of the progress avatar

props.name: status.width
props.description: The width of the rendered status

props.name: status.type
props.description: The status of the user

props.name: status.colour
props.description: The colour of the status

props.name: status.circle
props.description: Whether the status should be rendered as a circle

props.name: overlay.display
props.description: Whether the overlay should be displayed

props.name: overlay.level
props.description: The alpha/opacity level that the overlay should render with

props.name: overlay.colour
props.description: The colour to render the overlay

props.name: rank
props.description: Data about the user's rank

props.name: level
props.description: Data about the user's level

props.name: currentXP
props.description: Data about the user's current XP

props.name: requiredXP
props.description: Data about the user's required XP

props.name: username
props.description: Data about the user's username

props.name: discriminator
props.description: Data about the user's discriminator

typedefs.name: XPForLevel
typedefs.description: Calculates the amount of XP for a level.

params.name: level
params.description: The level to calculate the amount of XP for

returns.description: The amount of XP required for the provided level

typedefs.name: Font
typedefs.description: A font to register with Canvas for usage during building.

props.name: path
props.description: The path to the font file

props.name: family
props.description: The name of the font family to register it under

props.name: weight
props.description: The weight of the font

props.name: style
props.description: The style of the font

typedefs.name: InputData
typedefs.description: Input to generate the Rank Card with.

props.name: level
props.description: The level of the user the rank card is being generated for

props.name: xpForLevel
props.description: A function that calculates the amount of XP per level

props.name: user
props.description: The user to generate the rank card for

props.name: rank
props.description: The rank of the user

props.name: fonts
props.description: The fonts to register for usage during building

props.name: usernameLength
props.description: The length to shorten the username to

props.name: stripAccents
props.description: Whether accents should be stripped from the username or not

typedefs.name: BuildFonts
typedefs.description: Fonts provided when building to customise rank cards.

props.name: bold
props.description: The font to use for bold text

props.name: regular
props.description: The font to use for regular text
